engine.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that specifies all the requirements of an entity.
    Author:
    Marco

      • Entity

        public Entity(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f position)
        Constructs and entity with a scale of 1 and a rotation of 0
        Parameters:
        position - The position in the world

      • Entity

        public Entity(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f position,
              float rotation)
        Constructs and entity with a scale of 1
        Parameters:
        position - The position in the world
        rotation - The rotation measured from positive x-axis in degrees

    • Method Detail

      • setEnvironment

        public static void setEnvironment(EntityManager em,
                                  GraphicsHandler gh,
                                  EventHandler eh)
        Sets the manager and graphics that the entity has access to. This must be done before the game is started.
        Parameters:
        em - The entity manager
        gh - The garphics

      • getDamage

        public float getDamage()
        Returns:
        The damage that is associated with the entity, which can be used to deal specific damages

      • setMaxPosition

        public void setMaxPosition(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f max)
        Set the maximum position in world space the this entity will clamped to
        Parameters:
        max - The max position, i.e top right of the clamped region

      • setMinPosition

        public void setMinPosition(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f min)
        Set the minimum position in world space the this entity will clamped to
        Parameters:
        min - The min position, i.e bottom left of the clamped region

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draw the entity, i.e. the drawable components

      • update

        public void update(float dt,
                   float t)
        Update the entity, i.e. all updateable components and also notify all the notifier components. Also check the health of the entity and remove if necessary.
        Parameters:
        dt - Change in time from previous frame
        t - Total time elapsed of the game
